alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 15 at 1:54PM MST until October 15 at 2:30PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM MST FOR MARICOPA COUNTY... At 154 PM MST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Sycamore Creek to near Desert Mountain to near Arrowhead Mall, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Scottsdale, Paradise Valley, Round Valley, New River, Sycamore Creek, Sunflower, Cave Creek, Carefree, Piestewa Peak Park, Deer Valley Airport, Lake Pleasant, McDowell Mountain Park, North Mountain Park and Desert Mountain. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 210 and 241. AZ Route 51 between mile markers 3 and 15. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 211 and 219. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
